summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley dated July 30, 2009. The email discusses a call made by Staley and includes a disclaimer regarding confidentiality and legal matters.

The email contains a disclaimer regarding confidentiality and legal matters.
